sentence.Network_en: But when there is not a strong hand at the helm , clannishness tends to overcome discipline.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是如果掌舵的人不强, 派系之争就会破坏纪律.

sentence.Network_en: It is thus clear that the residual influences of clannishness must not be underestimated.
sentence.Network_cn: 可见宗法观念的余毒决不能轻视.
